sentence.Network_en: Suddenly we saw lots of specks running off Sapper Hill.
sentence.Network_cn: 突然我们看到许多小黑点,从萨珀山跑走了.

sentence.Network_en: Making sure that there was nobody about, the sapper touched off the explosive.
sentence.Network_cn: 确信周围无人了, 工兵才把炸药点着.

list.abs: Orc sapper(兽人工兵) 介绍:比人类工兵皮厚,基本性能一样,但没有地雷技能。 需求:Melee 1、Teamwork 1 属性:弓箭 21、火器 -4、火焰 21、闪电 11、冰冻 -.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from the verb sap + -er

entry.def: A sapper is a soldier whose job is to do building, digging, and similar work.

example.ex: They requested sappers to mend bridges or remove mines.
example.tran: 他们要求坑道工兵修桥或拆雷。

means.word_mean: 1. a military engineer who lays or detects and disarms mines
2. a military engineer who does sapping (digging trenches or undermining fortifications)

auth_sentence.content: Sapper Foster was a genuine, down-to-earth guy and will be missed by all who knew him.

auth_sentence.content: Capt Greg Harris, Battle Group Engineer, Combined Forces Sangin, said Sapper Foster impressed him with his "enthusiastic manner".

auth_sentence.content: This poster came to me from my father, who was in the Royal Engineers as a sapper during the Second World War, in the UK.
